Brain Spark

Are you a fan of solving puzzles and aptitude problems? Is working out the mind your favorite exercise? Then there isn't a better time to put on your thinking caps!



INSTRUCTIONS

Rounds:

  1. Prelims: This is an elimination round with 30 MCQs of 30 mins.
  2. Mains: The teams shortlisted will be provided with a set of questions to solve.

Team size

Single or Pair
